SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna_board WHERE mem_id = #{memId} AND group_layer = 1 AND bo_check = 'N'

SELECT bo_no, a.mem_id, bo_title, bo_content, bo_reg_date, original_no, group_ord, group_layer, bo_check, ans_mem_id, b.mem_name as expert_name FROM qna_board a, member b WHERE a.ans_mem_id = b.mem_id(+) AND bo_no = #{boNo}

SELECT TB1.*, TB2.expert_name FROM (SELECT a.bo_no, a.mem_id, a.bo_title, a.bo_content, to_char(a.bo_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as bo_reg_date, a.original_no, a.group_ord, a.group_layer, a.bo_check, a.ans_mem_id, b.mem_name as mem_name FROM qna_board a ,member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id)TB1 , (SELECT a.bo_no, a.mem_id, a.bo_title, a.group_layer, a.original_no, b.mem_name as expert_name FROM qna_board a ,member b WHERE a.ans_mem_id = b.mem_id(+)) TB2 WHERE TB1.bo_no = TB2.bo_no
ORDER BY TB1.original_no DESC, TB1.group_ord ASC

SELECT T1.*, T2.expert_name FROM (SELECT a.bo_no, a.mem_id, a.bo_title, a.bo_content, TO_CHAR(a.bo_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as bo_reg_date, a.original_no, a.group_ord, a.group_layer, a.bo_check, a.ans_mem_id, b.mem_name as mem_name FROM qna_board a ,member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.mem_id = #{memId} )T1 , (SELECT a.bo_no, a.mem_id, a.bo_title, a.group_layer, a.original_no, b.mem_name as expert_name FROM qna_board a ,member b WHERE a.ans_mem_id = b.mem_id(+)) T2 WHERE t1.bo_no = t2.bo_no ORDER BY t1.original_no DESC, t1.group_ord ASC
